content.rendered:
Directed by Raja Bundela. Raja Bundela.

Cast .Zeenat Aman.Raj Babbar.Meenu Bhardwaj.Raja Bundela.Shweta Giri.Haider Khan.Hyder Khan. Mobin Khan(Hollywood Producer Mobin Khan).Mohsin Khan. Mohsin Afroz Khan(Salim).Sushmita Mukherjee.Alok Nath.Hemant Pandey.Sada

Language Hindi.

Producers Chander Shekhar Bali. Ravinder Choudhary. Ganesh Sagar. Aradhana Sharma. Deepak Sharma.

Production D.S. Productions.
